name: @git-stunts/git-warp
description: Deterministic WARP graph over Git: graph-native storage, traversal, and tooling.
author: James Ross <james@flyingrobots.dev>

scripts.test: sh -c 'if [ "$GIT_STUNTS_DOCKER" = "1" ]; then vitest run test/unit "$@"; else docker compose run --build --rm test npm run test:local -- "$@"; fi' --
scripts.benchmark: sh -c 'if [ "$GIT_STUNTS_DOCKER" = "1" ]; then vitest bench --run test/benchmark "$@"; else docker compose run --build --rm test npm run benchmark:local -- "$@"; fi' --
scripts.demo: cd examples && docker compose up -d && docker compose exec demo bash
scripts.demo:setup: cd examples && docker compose up -d && docker compose exec demo sh -c 'cd /app && npm install --silent && cd /demo && node /app/examples/scripts/setup.js'
scripts.demo:explore: cd examples && docker compose exec demo node /app/examples/scripts/explore.js
scripts.demo:inspect: cd examples && docker compose exec demo node /app/examples/scripts/inspect-index.js
scripts.demo:lagrangian: cd examples && docker compose exec demo node /app/examples/scripts/lagrangian-path.js
scripts.demo:bench-streaming: cd examples && docker compose up -d && docker compose exec demo node /app/examples/scripts/streaming-benchmark.js
scripts.demo:bench-traversal: cd examples && docker compose up -d && docker compose exec demo node /app/examples/scripts/traversal-benchmark.js
scripts.prepack: npm run lint && npm run test:local
scripts.test:node20: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml --profile node20 run --build --rm test-node20
scripts.test:node22: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml --profile node22 run --build --rm test-node22
scripts.test:bun: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml --profile bun run --build --rm test-bun
scripts.test:deno: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml --profile deno run --build --rm test-deno
